name: External Candidate Sourcing AI Worker
description: Prospects passive candidates via LinkedIn and email with highly personalized outreach — converting passive talent into active applicants at 3–5× the response rate of template-based approaches.
keyBenefit: 15+ hours/week saved on manual research and writing
overview: This AI Worker handles the most challenging — and highest-value — recruiting work: converting passive candidates into applicants. It works with recruiters to identify target candidates through LinkedIn searches, extracts comprehensive profile data, analyses background against job requirements, and crafts highly personalized LinkedIn messages and emails. Every outreach references specific aspects of the candidate's experience, dramatically improving response rates over generic templates.
